name: Timezone
overview: Cool H.E.R.O-esque shoot'em up game. Published in Magic Disk 64 1989/12. As one of the greatest inventors of your age, you have developed a new machine, the TIMEBLASTER, with the help of which it is possible to beam from one planetary system to another in a matter of seconds. Before you post this news, however, go to the planet Zynox for a test. Once there, inquire about the area, but when you return your TIMEBLASTER has disappeared. . . Now you have 4 hours to find the 8 parts of the timeblaster before your oxygen supply runs out. The inhabitants of the planet are certainly not helping you find it. . .
